pr_title: KOGITO-2721: Update to latest Patternfly version

timeline.message: KOGITO-2721: changes from rebase with domain explorer filters
KOGITO-2721: Update to latest Patternfly version

timeline.bodyText: I would keep our OUIAUtils implementation - the patternfly one adds a PF4- selector to the component type and it's not necessary, plus will limit the places that need to be changed.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: those additions are expected - PF4 turned OUIA on by default, so the components that support it will have similar snapshots.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -189,80 +172,57 @@ exports[`KogitoEmptyState component tests Reset test 1`] = `
- - - - - - - <h5 - className="pf-c-title pf-m-lg" - > - No child process instances - </h5> - - -
+ + + + - This process has no related sub processes - </div> - </EmptyStateBody> - <Component - onClick={[MockFunction]} - variant="link" - > - <ComponentWithOuia - component={[Function]} - componentProps={ - Object { - "children": "Reset to default", - "onClick": [MockFunction], - "variant": "link", - } - } - consumerContext={null} + <h5 + className="pf-c-title pf-m-lg" + > + No child process instances + </h5> + + +
+ This process has no related sub processes +
+ +

timeline.author: jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: for all the removed function arguments also please remove the lines in documentation for the function.
